title: P equals ATC, exceeds MC in monopolistic comp LR

content.question: Which of the following is true of a monopolisti-cally competitive firm in long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Price equals marginal cost and average total cost.
Price equals average total cost but is greater than marginal cost.
Price equals marginal cost and is greater than average total cost.
The firm makes no attempt to differentiate its products.
The firm earns positive economic profits by producing at minimum average cost.

content.answer: Price equals average total cost but is greater than marginal cost.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
